titleStmt.title: To the Kings Most Excellent Majesty the humble petition of Your Majesties most dutiful and loyal subjects, the commissioners of your leiutenancy, and of the officers, citizens and souldiers of the several regiments and companies of the militia and trained bands within your city of London, and the suburbs and liberties thereof.
titleStmt.author: Committee for the Militia of London.
